title: Business Requirements Document: 3T Children's Tic Tac Toe App
description: A digital Tic Tac Toe game, '3T', designed specifically for young children. The app provides a fun, colorful, and intuitive interface for easy gameplay. It aims to be more than just a game by incorporating educational elements through an AI coach, fostering both strategic thinking and positive social skills in a safe, child-friendly environment.
objectives: Create a highly engaging and intuitive user experience for young children through vibrant visuals, playful audio, and simple navigation.
Introduce foundational strategic thinking and problem-solving skills through a friendly, AI-powered coach that offers gentle tips and encouragement.
Provide flexible play options, including a single-player mode against a friendly AI and a two-player mode for shared fun with a friend or family member.
Foster a positive and resilient mindset by celebrating wins with cheerful animations and handling losses with gentle, encouraging feedback.
Offer a safe environment for social interaction by focusing on local, pass-and-play two-player mode and positive reinforcement.
